Dialogue: System repair activated. Back up power on line.

Speaker: janessa
Dialogue: Let's just get out of here.

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: The ship's in bad shape. Back to the labs. Let's check out status.

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: There's a red lever on the wall beside you. Pull it!

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: Then break it! If you don't pull it, the ship's going to depressurize!

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: Hurry Rizzo! You have to reverse the pressurization.

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: If the ship goes, so does Jaso.

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: It's better this way. If we were rescued Jason would just get off the ship. You want him on your precious Earth II?

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: Boeman don't. You know I'm right.

Speaker: janessa
Dialogue: Are you crazy?! Pull the lever!

Speaker: janessa
Dialogue: You happy? You've killed us all!

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: THat's the sound of deep space attacking the integrity of the ship.

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: Teleportation? Some way to beam us the hell out of dodge?

Speaker: thorgan
Dialogue: You read a lot of Science Fiction didn't you?

Speaker: janessa
Dialogue: A little late to be thinking about escape, isn't it?

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: That's a good fantasy, though. Kinky, but good.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: It's the engine, reactors, audiometers, it's the stuff that makes the ship go zoom.

Speaker: thorgan
Dialogue: Sure but what good will that do?

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: When the left hull goes, so will the right.

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: What if we blow the walkways first? Leave Jason over here to go up with the ship?

Speaker: janessa
Dialogue: You know, Yllo seemed to think we could catch this guy alive, well, he'd be worth millions.

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: Any connection between your reality and mine is purely coincidental.

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: Come on. You got all these gadgets and shit. Why can't we get inside the right hull, seal up the doors and blow the walkways?

Speaker: thorgan
Dialogue: We're not supposed to do that.

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: What are you gonna do, tell me?

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: The engine room will have molecular welders. We could seal up the hull.

Speaker: janessa
Dialogue: YeaH, GREAT IDEA! And I'll keep the big guy distracted with a blow job.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: Remember to roll his balls around a bit.

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: Then you better hurry. I'll blow alley one, Delongpre, you and Rizzo take there. Janessa you ready two and we'll meet up there.

Speaker: thorgan
Dialogue: Come here, might as well fix that arm.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: I think I speak on behalf of the group when I say this is bad news.

Speaker: thorgan
Dialogue: Oh, hush. I disengaged your pain programming.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: My father wanted me to be a businessman.

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: So, you thought you'd be cool. Go against your father's wishes? Yeah, that's grown up.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: My father's company imports and exports. Archaeology is part of the business. We happen to get along just fine, smartass. Look, why don't you bust somebody else's balls for a change.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: You thought I meant...too tough to apologize, huh? You must have been a very lonely girl.

Speaker: janessa
Dialogue: Thorgan, you little shit, is that you?

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: When I was four, the ocean quit producing life. Too many pollutants. Nuclear testing, the occasional terrorist bombing...the atmosphere was shit by the time I was eight. We moved underground when I was twelve.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: Were you close to your father?

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: It's on the table where I left it! What the hell are you doing?! Hurry up!

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: Well, we'd be dead without you. You know that, don't you?

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: It's true.  You caused enough stink that we were at least a little cautious. Of course this is the first field trip I went on that had a body count.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: I'm not much, but I promise, I won't let this guy get you.

Speaker: janessa
Dialogue: Damnit! You scared the hell out of me!

Speaker: brodski
Dialogue: Give me a break! What happened?

Speaker: janessa
Dialogue: Jason. He's what happened. Then Grendel hit Space Lab.

Speaker: brodski
Dialogue: Space Lab?! Wait'll I get my hands on Yllo.

Speaker: janessa
Dialogue: Yllo's dead. We...we thought you were too.

Speaker: brodski
Dialogue: Takes more than a steelbalde to take this old dog down.

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: Janessa, we're on our way to you!

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: You tell me! She's only set one charge. And it's not finished!

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: We can't lead him into the other hull!

Speaker: thorgan
Dialogue: Yes, I've reprogrammed you. You are very brave. Bad ass.

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: What are we waiting for?!! Come on!!

Speaker: janessa
Dialogue: He came for me, I had to run!

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: Thorgan, you're brilliant. Have I told you that lately?

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: I'd say we have about ten minutes tops.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: Then stop talking and work faster!

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: Okay, Janessa, give me your last charge.

Speaker: janessa
Dialogue: I...I don't know what I did...

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: Can we blow it with just two?

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: If we don't sever the hull completely she'll drag us down with her.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: Well, it was a good plan.

Speaker: brodski
Dialogue: Damnit to hell, you left me back there to die!

Speaker: brodski
Dialogue: Yeah, yeah.  Well, what have you got to say for yourself?

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: Sergeant, we could use a big bomb.

Speaker: brodski
Dialogue: Blowing the walkway? You come up with that yourself?

Speaker: thorgan
Dialogue: You did good, Kay-Em. I'm proud of you.

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: Hurry up people! We're running out of time.

Speaker: thorgan
Dialogue: As long as they're connected we can blow them all simultaneously from a safe distance.

Speaker: brodski
Dialogue: Kid, you ever thought about the marine corp?

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: I need another minute. Come on!

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: Faster! Don't we have another gun?

Speaker: janessa
Dialogue: They're not gonna make it. Close the door before he gets us all.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: Forget it. I had to rewire it. Once it's started it won't stop.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: I think...I think maybe we did.

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: I've changed the course for Earth II. And I sent a distress signal.

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: Our ship has been damaged, most of the crew dead. We need evac.

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Copy that Grendel. Rescue enroute. You should hit EARTH II orbit in fifteen minutes. Rescue ETA twenty minutes.

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: The pressures cause the engines to overheat! Hurry!

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: Weapons? All this technology and what good has it done?!

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: And now we're all out of it.

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: The ship's depressurizing, the engines overheating. When it  reaches the core, we're done.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: Then do it. The rescue ship can find us here right?

Speaker: brodski
Dialogue: Can't shut em' down from here.

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: Somebody's gonna have to go back to the engine room.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: You ain't catching my ass in there again.

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: You know, this future shit sucks. I'll fucking do it.

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: You want some of me or not?

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: See now that was stupid. Persistent, yes, but stupid.

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: Not this time, asshole. This time I'm gonna watch you burn in hell.

Speaker: boeman
Dialogue: The docking bay was damaged after the explosion. Meet us at the airlock.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: Got it.  You ever space walked?

Speaker: thorgan
Dialogue: Don't worry. He can't see us.

Speaker: thorgan
Dialogue: Kay-Em, you've saved our lives, you know that don't you?

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: I knew you were a little sick, but Geez.

Speaker: thorgan
Dialogue: This is gonna work. If he sticks to the program. Will he? Stick to the program?

Speaker: rizzo
Dialogue: His mother was killed before his eyes. That's what drove him insane. It'll work.

Speaker: delongpre
Dialogue: That sounds like Rizzo having faith in some of that future shit.
